title: OpenAI partners with Walmart to let users buy products in ChatGPT, furthering chatbot shopping push
description: NEW YORK (AP) — OpenAI is partnering with Walmart to let shoppers make purchases directly within ChatGPT, furthering the artificial intelligence company'
content:
NEW YORK (AP) — OpenAI is partnering with Walmart to let shoppers make purchases directly within ChatGPT, furthering the artificial intelligence company’s push to turn its chatbot into a virtual merchant as it seeks to boost revenue.

title: AMD Just Scored Another Big AI Chip Deal-What You Need to Know
description: Oracle agreed to buy 50,000 GPUs from Advanced Micro Devices to build out its artificial intelligence capacity, a strong signal for broader AI demand.
content:
Advanced Micro Devices just racked up another major AI deal, with signs of more to come.
Cloud computing giant Oracle (ORCL) said Tuesday that it agreed to buy 50,000 GPUs from AMD (AMD) to build out its capacity to help customers scale their use of ... [572 chars]

title: Foundations commit $500 million to center human needs amid AI
description: Ten philanthropic foundations are committing $500 million across the next five years to place human interests at the forefront of artificial intelligence's rapid integration into daily life.
content:
By JAMES POLLARD, Associated Press
NEW YORK (AP) — Artificial intelligence is a matter of design — not destiny.
